I'm going to take a bit of a nap, I think. Listening to This American Life. Yes. This is a good way to spend an afternoon.
Home and more Radiohead. Yes, it sounds like a plan indeed.
Making music in spanish.
In Rainbows: 15 Step, very Venetian Snaresy. Nude, very Sigur Ros-y. Not a criticism, I love it.
Heading to school, new Radiohead album in hand (and head).
Falling asleep listening to cartalk...
Making some food and then wandering around wondering if there's homework I missed- and then realizing I don't care either way.

commits.message: Adding pym, tabletop, boilerplate to app.coffee
Adding support for Open Graph ( http://ogp.me/ ) for sStories so they appear correctly in Facebook, using image & title of first image slide
